results.title: Investigating the effect of metformin on chemobrain: Reports from cells to bedside.
results.text_hl: Several benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on chemobrain have been suggested, including anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@, anti-oxidative stress, restoring impaired mitochondrial function, stabilizing apoptosis, ameliorating impairments to dendritic spine density, normalizing brain senescence protein levels, and attenuating reductions in cell viability, along with reversing @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@learning and memory deficits@@@.

citations.NLM: Leddy E, Attachaipanich T, Chattipakorn N, Chattipakorn SC. Investigating the effect of metformin on chemobrain: Reports from cells to bedside. Exp Neurol. 2024 Dec 27;385():115129. PMID: 39733854

results.title: The effects of endurance exercise and metformin on memory impairment caused by diabetes.
results.text_hl: The present study aims to investigate the effects of two kinds of endurance exercise including high-intensity interval training (HIIT) and moderate-intensity continuous training (MICT) as well as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@impaired memory and learning@@@ related to @CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@streptozotocin@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Streptozocin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013311 @@@STZ@@@) induced @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Reconsidering repurposing: long-term metformin treatment impairs cognition in Alzheimer's model mice
results.text_hl: In sum, these findings indicate that chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment causes @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@associative learning impairments@@@ in @DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Evaluation of the effects of metformin as adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase activator on spatial learning and memory in a rat model of multiple sclerosis disease.
results.text_hl: Here, we have tried to study the preservative effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ as @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@adenosine monophosphate-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@) activator on the hippocampus dentate gyrus (DG) neuronal firing pattern, motor coordination, and @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@learning & memory loss@@@ following MS induction.

results.title: Metformin attenuates sevoflurane-induced neurocognitive impairment through AMPK-ULK1-dependent autophagy in aged mice.
results.text_hl: Autophagy activity and AMP-activated protein kinase (AMPK) and @GENE_ULK1 @GENE_22241 @@@ULK1@@@ phosphorylation in the hippocampus were also measured. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ pretreatment attenuated the @CHEMICAL_Sevoflurane @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077149 @@@sevoflurane@@@-induced spatial @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@learning and memory impairment@@@.

results.title: Novel potential of metformin on valproic acid-induced autism spectrum disorder in rats: involvement of antioxidant defence system.
results.text_hl: In utero @CHEMICAL_Valproic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014635 @@@VPA@@@ exposure caused significant reduction in sociability index, social novelty preference index in three-chambered apparatus and spatial @<m>DISEASE_Learning_Disabilities</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007859 @@@learning and reference memory deficits@@@ in the MWM task as well as increase in repetitive/@DISEASE_Anxiety @DISEASE_MESH:D001007 @@@anxiety@@@-like behaviour in Y maze and EPM tests, respectively, which were ameliorated by post-treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in a dose-dependent manner.

citations.NLM: Ishola IO, Balogun AO, Adeyemi OO. Novel potential of metformin on valproic acid-induced autism spectrum disorder in rats: involvement of antioxidant defence system. Fundam Clin Pharmacol. 2020 Dec;34(6):650-661. PMID: 32415700
